metadata.Title: CVE-2012-3355

Platform: SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 12

metadata.Description: (1) AlbumTab.py, (2) ArtistTab.py, (3) LinksTab.py, and (4) LyricsTab.py in the Context module in GNOME Rhythmbox 0.13.3 and earlier allows local users to execute arbitrary code via a symlink attack on a temporary HTML template file in the /tmp/context directory.
